channel.title: New Interface System Alpha
channel.description:
Personally, I like it a lot. Tell me what you guys think of it from personal experience or from a few images.
Combat preset: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zH9khF8.png[/img]
Default preset: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vFZWuyM.png[/img]

item.title: New Interface System Alpha
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

Anyone noticed any disadvantages/advantages with the new layouts?

Depending on how many interfaces you have on the screen, your visibility on the main game screen will of course be limited. But if you re-size your browser to full screen, you really shouldn’t have too much of a problem.

Read full topic

The “classic” interface layout is pretty similar.

item.title: New Interface System Alpha
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

RSCShadow:

Can’t tell if you’re being sarcastic or not but WoW was definitely not the only game of that type. The features in RS now (abilities) aren’t that original but they don’t have to be. They’re familiar and more fun to use; WoW wasn’t the first and only game to use them. RS’s new interface system is still RS’s interface. Just because you can drag windows around doesn’t automatically mean they’re trying to copy WoW. Nearly every MMORPG has a feature like that.

I agree.

Read full topic

item.title: New Interface System Alpha
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:18, topic:517843”]You’re joking right? World of Warcraft is extremely original… It was the only game of its type, and I say ‘was’ because so many games are becoming more and more like it each day. cbf explaining more how much stupid your statement(s) are.[/quote]Can’t tell if you’re being sarcastic or not but WoW was definitely not the only game of that type. The features in RS now (abilities) aren’t that original but they don’t have to be. They’re familiar and more fun to use; WoW wasn’t the first and only game to use them. RS’s new interface system is still RS’s interface. Just because you can drag windows around doesn’t automatically mean they’re trying to copy WoW. Nearly every MMORPG has a feature like that.

item.title: New Interface System Alpha
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:24, topic:517843”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=636106.msg4289057#msg4289057 date=1366906131]
seems like a lot of clutter personally i though the original viewport was just fine.
[/quote]you can disable certain interfaces afaik[/quote]
Yes, the ones with the red ‘X’ on the upper right hand side you can close and open them. There are also more interfaces like that on another interface and you can drag them onto the main game screen. For example, there is a ‘My Social’ interface and it includes things like your friends list and what not. And you can drag your friends list onto the main game screen.
Picture of multiple interfaces on the main game screen:

9u5Ah41.jpg850×481

As for the worn equipment tab, if you make it large enough, it will show your character as well. And you move interfaces on top of each other to make that whole interface have tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: New Interface System Alpha
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

imthenull:

You’re joking right? World of Warcraft is extremely original… It was the only game of its type, and I say ‘was’ because so many games are becoming more and more like it each day. cbf explaining more how much stupid your statement(s) are.

The color scheme is similar… Anyone can use the shade of blue that both RuneScape and World of Warcraft use. The two games are totally different. There are more differences than similarities, it’s just that people point out the similarities first and more often than the differences.

Read full topic

item.title: New Interface System Alpha
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

imthenull:

You’re joking right? World of Warcraft is extremely original… It was the only game of its type, and I say ‘was’ because so many games are becoming more and more like it each day. cbf explaining more how much stupid your statement(s) are.

I disagree, their are plenty of examples where a lot of games have similarities with WoW and those similarities pre-dates WoWs. I’m not saying as a whole game they had all the functions etc but many features etc WoW use are not original. Feel free to look it up yourself, I don’t feel the need to argue/debate about it as it’s a dead end argument/debate.

Read full topic
